Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards put up 37 points, 8 assists, and 7 rebounds on 48/46/75 shooting from the field
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards dedicated an orange wristband to a young fan named Luca who was battling cancer
Others: Anthony Edwards seems to really light up when facing the Clippers. In 17 career games against them, he's averaged 22.1 points, 5.1 rebounds, and 3.9 assists
